text: Sony SAB is an Indian pay-to-air Hindi television channel. It focuses on comedy contents. ==History== Sony SAB was launched by Adhikari brothers in 1999 as a Hindi language channel. Later, the channel rebranded as a Hindi- general comedy entertainment channel and launched many iconic shows. Sony SAB launches it's HD channel on 5 September 2015 on the occasion of Ganesh Chaturthi ==Programming== ==References== category:Television channels in India Category:1999 establishments in Asia
title: Sony SAB
